Package rest.markets.exceptions

Class RestExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • rest.markets.exceptions.RestExceptionHandler
  • @ControllerAdvice
public class RestExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    This class handles an exception's throw. It returns a typical http status, which explain the kind of problem occurred, and the exception handled.

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> handleAnyException​(java.lang.Exception ex)

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> handleJsonException​(java.lang.Exception ex)
      This method handle all the json related exceptions that occur when it is impossible to parse the request in a json format.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> handleNotExistingFieldException​(NotExistingFieldException ex)
      This method handle NotExistingFieldException and NotExistingFilterException, that occur when a wrong field or filter is sent form a user request.

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> handleAnyException​(java.lang.Exception ex)

        ex - the exception thrown
        Returns:
        the http internal server error status and the exception

        Returns:
